hero.title: Diplomatic Tensions Ease After High-Level Talks
hero.intro: Months of escalating rhetoric appear to be cooling down following a series of high-level diplomatic meetings held in Geneva this weekend between major global powers.
hero.author: David Smith
hero.contentLeft: The focus was on long-term stability and de-escalation in key contested regions.
hero.contentRight:
A joint statement released early Sunday morning highlighted several areas of mutual agreement.

Markets have reacted positively to the news of the breakthrough.
